Package frc.lightning.subsystems

Interface LightningDrivetrain

  • All Superinterfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.Subsystem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CTREDrivetrain, NeoDrivetrain
    public interface LightningDrivetrain
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.Subsystem
    Base differential drivetrain type that is capable of following motion profiles.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  LightningDrivetrain.DriveCommand
      Sample command that can be applied to LightningDrivetrain type

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      void brake()

      Configures all motors in coast mode for slower deceleration

      • getRelativePose

        edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.geometry.Pose2d getRelativePose()
        Returns the position of the robot since it was zeroed with setRelativePose().
        Returns:
        The robot's position as a Pose2d object.

      • setRelativePose

        void setRelativePose()
        Zeros the pose returned bu getRelativePose() to be relative to zero. Useful for using robot-relative trajectories while still keping track of field pose.

      • getSpeeds

        edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.kinematics.DifferentialDriveWheelSpeeds getSpeeds()
        The current real output to the drivetrain.
        Returns:
        The real speeds of the drivetrain as a DifferentialDriveWheelSpeeds object.
